casebody.data:
United States Electric Light & Power Co., Appellant, v. Rimoldi, Respondent. (Common Pleas of New York City and County,

General Term.

February 24, 1892.) Appeal from second district court. Action by the United States Electric Light & Power Company against Jo. seph Rimoldi.

Argued before Bischoff and Pryor, JJ.

Cravath & Harding, for appellant. 8. P. & J. MoL. Hash, for respondent.

No opinion. Judgment affirmed, with costs.
